tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mediation_plans (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  mediation_type VARCHAR(255),
  mediator_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CaseData (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_description TEXT,
  client_id INT,
  case_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MediationPlan (
  mediation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  mediator_name VARCHAR(100),
  mediation_date DATE,
  mediation_outcome TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MediationCases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_title VARCHAR(255),
  case_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  participant_email VARCHAR(255),
  participant_role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MediationPlan (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  plan_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES MediationCases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE PersonalDetails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE CaseDetails (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_type VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_incident DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Mediators (
    mediator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    expertise VARCHAR(100),
    experience_years INT,
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE MediationPlan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    mediator_id INT,
    planned_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Clients (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name TEXT,
  client_age INT,
  client_gender TEXT
  )

CREATE TABLE Cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_description TEXT,
  client_id INT,
  case_start_date DATE,
  case_status TEXT
  )

CREATE TABLE Mediators (
  mediator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mediator_name TEXT,
  mediator_specialty TEXT
  )

CREATE TABLE Mediation_Plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  mediator_id INT,
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_date DATE
  )

CREATE TABLE Plan_Items (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id INT,
  item_name TEXT,
  item_description TEXT,
  item_status TEXT
  )
